code:
%%{Education_ContentCDN}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [Education_ContentCDN] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [Education_LMS_Portal]
    Cancelled --> [Education_StudentDB]

    state Created {Education_StudentDB] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [Education_ContentCDN]
    }

    state InProgress {Education_ClassroomService] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [Education_StudentDB]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {Education_ClassroomService] --> Blocked
        [Education_StudentDB] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [Education_ClassroomService]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [Education_GradeSync]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {Education_GradeSync] --> Done
        [Education_LMS_Portal] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [Education_ContentCDN]
        PartiallyDone --> [Education_ContentCDN]
    }
repo_description: Free and Open Source ERP platform
